title: News24.com | ‘Hunger will kill us, not corona’ – unemployed mother fears family will not survive extended lockdown
description: Nosapho Dukada, the unemployed mother of five, says the extended lockdown period could end her life. She fears that hunger, and not the Covid-19 coronavirus, will kill her and her family.
content:
Nosapho Dukada (50) says the extended lockdown period could end her life.
She fears that hunger, and not the Covid-19 coronavirus, will kill her and her family.
